ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:2, adjust:0});
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:2, u3:0, u4:0, aplitude:8, speed:4});
fade({r:80, g:0, b:0, speed:32, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:40, g:0, b:0, speed:32, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
“We're breakin' out of here!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
“We're gonna hop on a
torpedo and blast outta here!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Cloud}
“Don't worry!
I won't miss!”{PAUSE}“We don't even have a target.
We're just aiming at the sky.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Tifa}
“But how?
We're at the bottom of the sea!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Cid}
“Damn!
What are we gonna do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Yuffie}
“I wanna get outta here, now!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Cait Sith}
“What we gonna do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Vincent}
“We're at the bottom of the sea.”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“But how?
We're at the bottom of the sea!!”

{Vincent}
“We're at the bottom of the sea.”

{Cloud}
“We're gonna hop on a
torpedo and blast outta here!”

{Cloud}
“Don't worry!
I won't miss!”{PAUSE}“We don't even have a target.
We're just aiming at the sky.”
